sentence: Center Brian Allen could have his hands full with defenders in the middle.
author: Barry Wilner
title: Rams, 49ers renew long-running rivalry, while Chiefs, Bengals meet in a rare postseason matchup

sentence: Free agency is only four weeks away, and the Rams must make decisions on several key players: Miller, receiver Odell Beckham Jr., starting cornerback Darious Williams, offensive linemen Brian Allen and Austin Corbett, and defensive lineman Sebastian Joseph-Day.
title: Rams bask in Super Bowl win, hope Sean McVay, Aaron Donald want another

sentence: There are several appealing center options in free agency, including Ryan Jensen of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, Ben Jones of the Tennessee Titans and Brian Allen of the Los Angeles Rams.
author: Alex Ballentine
title: NFL Starters Who Could Have Their Jobs Stolen by Free-Agent Signings in 2022

sentence: If the Dolphins were looking to upgrade from Michael Deiter at center, various top options stayed put between Ryan Jensen in Tampa Bay, Ben Jones with the Titans and Brian Allen with the Los Angeles Rams.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Prized free-agent tackle Terron Armstead to visit Dolphins; La’el Collins goes to Bengals

sentence: “Coming off of an Achilles’, six months, and doing what he can to help our football team win, just having him back was awesome,” Rams center Brian Allen said Thursday.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Super wasn’t good enough for Rams’ Cam Akers
